name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.39 - The Mah-Jong 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

The authentic Mahjong game is available on SIMPLE series! And this is the classic 4-player type. The strength of CPU can be adjusted in 3 stages.
You can set 10 sections of detailed rules such as "Uradora" and "Shanyu". The thinking routine is the reputable "Made by Chatnoir".
Featuring the "Sign Calcuation Learning Mode" which teaches players the most complicated sign calculation in Mahjong in a step-by-step manner.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
